title: Spending Bill Provision Would Provide Big Boost To Party Fundraising
teaser: The 1,600-page omnibus spending bill includes language that raises contribution limits to the national party committees, bringing them above the realm of merely wealthy donors. Under the provision, donors can give a party a total of $778,000 â€” each year, an eight-fold increase.
